sentences: After the sinks in the CDM contact group concluded Thursday, several observers noted that agreement on this issue was now 'long overdue,' and suggested that the text in the annex on modalities and procedures will provide a sound basis for discussions at SBSTA-19.
Others were less optimistic and wondered if a decision would be postponed until COP-10, noting that the 27-page text remains heavily bracketed.
In other news, some observers expressed hope that Russias ratification would be submitted to the Duma for consideration next week, creating a much-needed boost to the subdued ambiance of SB-18.
